org.jetel.lookup

Class DBLookup

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.lookup.DBLookup
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Iterator<DataRecord>, Lookup

    public final class DBLookup
extends java.lang.Object
implements Lookup
    DBLookup that performs data fetch at once in single connection-synchronized operation. All fetched data is kept in memory.

      • getNumFound

        public int getNumFound()
        Description copied from interface: Lookup
        Returns size of the underlying collection.
        It is not recommended to use this method as in some implementations it simply iterates this iterator.
        Specified by:
        getNumFound in interface Lookup
        Returns:
        number of records found by last Lookup.seek() or Lookup.seek(DataRecord) method (current size of this underlaying collection) or -1 if the number can't be determined.
